title: La Malquerida
resume:
La malquerida is an upcoming Mexican telenovela to be produced by José Alberto Castro for Televisa. It is an adaptation of the play "La Malquerida", written by Spanish playwright Jacinto Benavente.
Victoria Ruffo and Christian Meier will star as the adult protagonist, Ariadne Díaz and Mane de la Parra will star as the young protagonists, while Brandon Peniche will star as the main antagonist.
